name: Youtube-mp3.org Purple Blue Theme
description: I use this site a lot and decided the look could be improved. This theme changes the bright white background to a darker grey one as well as changing text and text inputs to blue and purple shades. The theme is focused on giving a more welcoming feel to the site.
additional_info: Youtube Mp3 logo redone to make background transparent and match this theme. url linked to my Deviant art account. A higher quality logo is being drawn and will be added soon
